channel.title: Post your favorite subtle-revenge(ironic?) stories!
channel.description:
This is one i came up with after seeing the Westboro Baptist Church protests. For those of you who do not know what i am talking about. [img]http://www.theweeklings.com/wp-content/uploads/god_loves_fags.jpg[/img][img]http://media.npr.org/assets/img/2011/03/02/westboro1-3d0baab9ccc674c5428c2cf5342da0ffcee7da0e-s6-c30.jpg[/img] Obviously the one guy in the picture is on my side.
I was thinking if these members were out protesting and managed to get run over by someone. i would gladly stand out there and hold up a sign "Thank god for drunk drivers" I just think it is the sweet subtle revenge our troops deserve. I have 5 members of my family deployed in iraq at present and seeing these guys hurting would do me great pleasure.
I do not condone drunk driving.

item.title: Post your favorite subtle-revenge(ironic?) stories!
item.dc:creator: @matzie matzie
item.description:
@matzie wrote:

[quote=“Jmood, post:3, topic:525042”]If they wish to stand and look like fools who are we to stop them, the first amendment is really.

“Tho almighty shall not take thy freedom of foolishness form thy governed.”[/quote]

Respect goes along way though, and i think they are doing it for the wrong reason. (I know i said the shunned word in an argument, think)
If they have such a problem with the troops they should join and voice it as an inside issue. Would be a much better way to get things accomplished. The reason they are against our troops is because of homosexuals.
“Anyone who has a c-section is dooming humanity” unnatural child birth. Even if it saves their own life, its still not your choice to make.
The ones over giving their lives so they can have the right to free speech. And they are standing around bashing them. Tell me where the reason is in this?
I would like to see them over in the only hell that exists. If they call war justifiable manslaughter, then i am sure there is justification behind condemming those who do it for us. I would like to send them on a road trip to iraq to see what happens, where the stumble upon a IED. With no arms or legs, i would like to see them hold their signs.
New sign: “If Fags exist, its their fault -->”

Read full topic
